# ATOMIC DATA AND NUCLEAR DATA TABLES 18, 497-508 (1976)
#  ABSOLUTE PHOTOIONIZATION CROSS-SECTION TABLES
#  FOR HELIUM, NEON, ARGON, AND KRYPTON IN THE
#  VUV SPECTRAL REGIONS
# G. V. MARR University of Reading Reading RG6 2AF, England
# and
# J. B. WEST Daresbury Laboratory Warrington, WA4 4AD, England
# 1976
# DOI: 10.1016/0092-640X(76)90015-2

# Table 1. The Total Photoionization Cross Section of Helium from 
# 504 Å to 1.5 Å in Megabarns, 10^-18 cm^2
# λ (Å) E (eV) σ (Mb)
